name: Invesco RAFI Global Small-Mid ETF
longDescription: PZW seeks to generate capital growth over the longterm by investing directly or indirectly primarily in equities of small and mediumsized companies from developed markets globally. Invesco FTSE RAFI Global Small-Mid ETF (the ETF) seeks to replicate, before fees and expenses, the price and yield of the FTSE RAFI US 1500 Small-Mid Index and the FTSE RAFI Developed ex U.S. Mid Small 1500 Index, respectively (each, an underlying index).
fulldescription: PZW seeks to generate capital growth over the longterm by investing directly or indirectly primarily in equities of small and mediumsized companies from developed markets globally. Invesco FTSE RAFI Global Small-Mid ETF (the ETF) seeks to replicate, before fees and expenses, the price and yield of the FTSE RAFI US 1500 Small-Mid Index and the FTSE RAFI Developed ex U.S. Mid Small 1500 Index, respectively (each, an underlying index). This ETF gives investors exposures to small- and medium-sized companies from developed markets globally with the highest fundamental weightings using the Fundamental Index methodology developed by Research Affiliates, LLC.
fullAddress: 5140 Yonge Street, Suite 900, Toronto, ON, CA
